Management Accounting

Management Accounting helps you handle financial information in a manner that will enhance the financial and operational performance of a business. It ensures that financial challenges are met, and opportunities exploited. By using management accounting techniques, you are able to adapt a business to the opportunities and constraints it may face.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Apply forecasting and budgeting techniques for decision making, planning and control within the organisation. [Analysis; Application; Knowledge & Understanding; Learning; Problem Solving]

+  Analyse the working capital position of a business and apply working capital management techniques for decision making, planning and control within the organisation. [Analysis; Application; Knowledge & Understanding; Learning; Problem Solving]
